title: Coupchella Finale? OMG GOP STFU PLS 09.28.22
itunes:title: Coupchella Finale? OMG GOP STFU PLS 09.28.22
description:
In episode 1340, Miles and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by writer and comedian, Ellory Smith, to discuss... COUPCHELLA WEEKEND 2, OMG GOP STFU PLS, Pop-Culture Is Obsessed With The “Satanic Panic”, Why Netflix Keeps Making (Gross) True Crime Shows and more!

  1. COUPCHELLA WEEKEND 2
  2. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton fled his home to avoid being served with subpoena, court record says
  3.  OMG GOP STFU PLS
  4. Pop-Culture Is Obsessed With The “Satanic Panic”
  5. Devilish Danny DeVito Cartoon Sparks GOP Satanic Panic
  6. Riverdale's Satanic Panic storyline is completely irresponsible
  7. ‘Satanic worship, sodomy and even murder’: how Stranger Things revived the American satanic panic of the 80s
  8. Why Netflix Keeps Making (Gross) True Crime Shows
  9. Why Netflix's Jeffrey Dahmer series is receiving so much backlash
  10. My brother was murdered by Jeffrey Dahmer. Here's what it was like watching the Netflix show that recreated the emotional statement I gave in court.
  11. What Do the Families of Ted Bundy's Victims Think of the Netflix Documentary?
  12. The most respectful Jeffrey Dahmer TV show is one that doesn't exist at all
  13. Netflix slammed by ‘disgusted’ and ‘gobsmacked’ viewers after adding LGBTQ+ tag to Jeffrey Dahmer series

LISTEN: Murciana by Maestro Espada

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
